code:
graph LR subgraph "Input Sources" PC[Player Chat] PL[Player Location] PI[Player Inventory] WB[World Blocks] WS[World Structures] WT[World Trees] end subgraph "Data Processing" PC --> MSG[Message Parsing] PL --> CTX[Context Gathering] PI --> CTX WB --> CTX WS --> CTX WT --> CTX MSG --> JSON[JSON Message
Formation] CTX --> JSON JSON --> WS_COMM[WebSocket
Transmission] WS_COMM --> LLM_PROC[LLM Processing
with Context] end subgraph "LLM Context" LLM_PROC --> HIST[Chat History
Last 10 messages] LLM_PROC --> SYS[System Prompt
with world context] LLM_PROC --> TOOLS[Available Tools
Specifications] HIST --> AGENT[Agentic Loop] SYS --> AGENT TOOLS --> AGENT end subgraph "Output Generation" AGENT --> ACTIONS[Tool Actions] AGENT --> RESPONSE[Natural Language
Response] ACTIONS --> EXEC[Action Execution
in Minecraft] RESPONSE --> CHAT[Chat Message
to Player] EXEC --> FEEDBACK[Action Feedback] FEEDBACK --> AGENT end subgraph "Data Storage" HIST --> DB[(SQLite
Chat History)] EXEC --> CACHE[Tree Cache
Structure Cache
NPC Ownership] end style CTX fill:#e8f5e8 style LLM_PROC fill:#f3e5f5 style AGENT fill:#fff3e0 style CACHE fill:#e3f2fd
